Package ePortfolio

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ePortfolio.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the Gui interfaces to connect to portfolio

                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String symbol,

                      java.lang.String quantity)
        Connects guiBuy in portfolio to the Buy class
        Parameters:
        investmentType - type of investment
        name - name of investment
        symbol - symbol of investment
        price - price of investment
        quantity - quantity of investment

        an investment

                                         java.lang.String keyWords,
                                         java.lang.String lowPrice,
                                         java.lang.String highPrice)
        Connects guiSearch in portfolio to the Search class
        Parameters:
        symbol - symbol of investment
        keyWords - keywords inside the investments name
        lowPrice - lowest price of all investments
        highPrice - highest price of all investments
        Returns:
        a list of investments
